data.text:
Woah, I didn't realize there was such a beautiful beach 
near our lodging♪ It reminds me of the beaches near 
my hometown in Tomakomai!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
And so there you have it. Having flown in on the wings 
of a paper bird, this is Tomakomai's oyster-loving local idol, 
Hokko Tarumae signing off! Bye bye!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text: (……pchon♪)

That was perfect! You looked so adorable! 
I could really feel your love for Tomakomai! 
No wonder they consider you to be their ambassador!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
R-Really!? That's great to hear…! 
Oh, but… if you have any advice 
or recommendations please let me know!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Hmm, let me think… Oh, how about trying Umasta? 
It could help you feel more down to earth!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Tarumae-chan, with Umasta you'd be able to show them 
what your daily life is like! I'm sure they'd love to see that.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Ohoho, well if you're trying to be more down to earth… 
Why not try using your Hokkaido dialect more often? 
After all, that's a very important part of your daily life, right?
data.name: Wonder Acute

data.text:
No! There's no way I could do that! 
My image is that of a pure, fluffy, and cute local idol!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
So… Sorry, but I don't think I can show them the real me. 
I'd rather show them my real local idol self…!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Don't worry, I get it! Keeping your image intact is important! 
But your real local idol self, huh? 
What's the best way to do that…?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: Ohoho… Ummster seems pretty difficult…
data.name: Wonder Acute

data.text: It's called Umasta, Acute-san.
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Tarumae, why not try a different venue? 
There's a strong feeling of ill intent directed at you here!
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
So why not try that building over there! 
It's in the same direction that your life energy is going, 
so it should help to bring good luck in your career and fortune!
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
There's way too many people over there, I won't be able to 
concentrate on the shoot. But… are you concerned about the 
Feng Shui of this place? I don't really care about those things.
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Really? You do know that Feng Shui is a well researched field 
of "environmental luck science", right!? After all, our 
environment and the colors we see do have an influence 
on the way we think, so how is this any different?
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
I don't care about that, so I'm staying here! After all, I'm able 
to control the way that I think without any influence!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Anyways, we weren't even talking about that. 
We were trying to help me convey my local idol self. 
What about doing… umm…
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text: I guess Mooster really is out of the question…
data.name: Wonder Acute

data.text:
We told you that it's called Umasta! 
It's called Umasta, silly.
data.name: Tarumae & Rickey

data.text: Lightbulb!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: Wh-What's gotten into you Falco-san?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
If we have the laid back Acute-san, the pragmatic 
Tarumae-chan, and the eccentric Ricky-san…
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
We could make a group of 3 to help 
gain more support! How does that sound!?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Gain more support…? 
No way no way!
data.name: Tarumae, Acute & Rickey

data.text:
Okay, we're going to be rolling soon! 
Tokai Teio-san, tell us how it tastes in 3, 2…
data.name: Assistant Director

data.text:
Mmm! It's so tasty and refreshing! 
I wish they sold it on campus!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I heard that a lot of students use these trails on their 
morning runs! The air here is refreshing and it's a 
nice change of pace from running near the city!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I might as well take this opportunity to go for a run! 
Plus I bet you guys want a shot of me running anyways, right?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
So that's why you should all come to our 
upcoming live performance! Hmm…? 
Why do you all look so dumbfounded?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Waaah!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Hey, isn't that… Machan?
data.name: Vodka

data.text:
Oh, I think you're right? 
Hold on, wait a second… isn't she standing in the shot!?
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet

data.text:
Wait, when did you get behind me!? 
Hold on… have you been following me 
the entire time!? Why would you do that!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Tehehe… Don't mind me…
data.name: Aston Machan

data.text: No, there's no way I couldn't mind!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I'm very sorry! It seems like one of our students is 
annoying you all! Machan, you can't just enter 
other people's shots! Come on, let's go.
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet

data.text:
Oh, I didn't know that… 
Okay everyone, that's all from Machan for today.
data.name: Aston Machan

data.text:
Don't feel down, Machan, in exchange 
I'll take a bunch of pictures of you over there.
data.name: Vodka

data.text:
Pictures!? I love that idea. Okay everyone, 
please remember your lovely Maa-chan!
data.name: Aston Machan

data.text:
Remember me tomorrow, the next day, and 
the following 100 years too! After all, I'll always 
be there in the corner of your heart. See you all later!
data.name: Aston Machan

data.text:
O-Oi! If you don't hurry up, 
Miss Perfect Student is gonna be upset…!
data.name: Vodka

data.text:
Okay… remember Aston Machan! 
I'll see you all again!
data.name: Aston Machan

data.text: Haa… Jeez…
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet

data.text: Come on already!
data.name: Daiwa & Vodka

title: I Won't Give Up The Limelight
